summary: Frank Bigelow, told he's been poisoned and has only a few days to live, tries to find out who killed him and why.
cast: Edmond O'Brien|Pamela Britton|Luther Adler|Beverly Garland|Lynn Baggett|William Ching|Henry Hart|Neville Brand|Laurette Luez|Jess Kirkpatrick|Cay Forester|Frank Jaquet|Lawrence Dobkin|Frank Gerstle|Carol Hughes|Michael Ross|Donna Sanborn|Bill Baldwin|Teddy Buckner|Frank Cady|Jadie Carson|Roy Engel|Douglas Evans|Sam Harris|Shifty Henry|David Jansen|Ray Laurie|Virginia Lee|Peter Leeds|George Lynn|Harold Miller|Hugh O'Brian|Jerry Paris|John Payne|Paul Picerni|Phillip Pine|Lynne Roberts|Van Streeter|Ivan Triesault|Beverly Warren|Cake Witchard
keywords: poison|iridium|radioactive material|dying man|victim searches for killer
title: Con las horas contadas
